SENT.plain: Ectopia lentis may belong to different syndromes, Marfan syndrome and homocystinuria being the most common
Hereditary ectopia lentis may also be an isolated ocular condition
Inheritance of simple ectopia lentis is autosomal dominant (AD) or autosomal recessive (AR)
In ectopia lentis et pupillae the pupils are characteristically oval and slit shaped
We will present our series of 10 cases
